1768                                return new FuncGetter<>(this, s -> Enum.valueOf(enumClass, s), String::valueOf);
1769                        }
1770
1771                        /**
1772                         * A URI property getter that parses URIs.
1773                         * @return getter that will parse URIs.
1774                         */
1775                        public PropertyGetter<URI> toURI() {
1776                                return new FuncGetter<>(this, URI::new, String::valueOf);
1777                        }
1778
1779                }
1780
1781                /**
1782                 * Mapped property getter.
1783                 *
1784                 * @param <T> will convert to this type.
1785                 */
1786                public sealed interface ChildPropertyGetter<T> extends PropertyGetter<T> {
1787
1788                        /**
1789                         * Parent.
1790                         * @return parent.
1791                         */
1792                        PropertyGetter<?> parent();
1793
1794                        @SuppressWarnings("null") // TODO eclipse bug
1795                        @Override
1796                        default String propertyString(T value) {
1797                                return switch (value) {
1798                                        case null -> throw new NullPointerException("null value passed into propertyString");
1799                                        case String s -> s;
1800                                        case Boolean b -> String.valueOf(b);
1801                                        case Integer i -> String.valueOf(i);
1802                                        case URI u -> String.valueOf(u);
1803                                        case Map<?, ?> m -> MapGetter._propertyString(m);
1804                                        case List<?> list -> ListGetter._propertyString(list);
1805                                        default -> throw new RuntimeException("Unable to convert to property string. value = " + value);
1806                                };
1807                        }
1808
1809                }
1810
1811                /**
1812                 * Sets up to converts a value.
1813                 * @param <U> value type
1814                 * @param mapper function.
1815                 * @return new property getter.
1816                 */
1817                default <U> PropertyGetter<U> map(PropertyFunction<? super T, ? extends U, ? super Exception> mapper) {
1818                        return new FuncGetter<T, U>(this, mapper, null);
1819                }
1820
1821                /**
1822                 * Fallback to value if property not found.
1823                 * @param fallback fallback value.
1824                 * @return new property getter.
1825                 */
1826                default RequiredPropertyGetter<T> orElse(T fallback) {
1827                        if (fallback == null) {
1828                                throw new NullPointerException();
1829                        }
1830                        return new FallbackGetter<T>(this, () -> fallback);
1831                }
1832
1833                /**
1834                 * Fallback to value if property not found.
1835                 * @param fallback supplier.
1836                 * @return new property getter.
1837                 */
1838                default RequiredPropertyGetter<T> orElseGet(Supplier<? extends T> fallback) {
1839                        Objects.requireNonNull(fallback, "fallback");
1840                        return new FallbackGetter<T>(this, fallback);
1841                }
1842
1843                /**
1844                 * A property getter that guarantees the result will not be missing usually
1845                 * because a non-null fallback is provided somewhere.
1846                 *
1847                 * @param <T> property type.
1848                 */
1849                public sealed interface RequiredPropertyGetter<T> extends ChildPropertyGetter<T> {
1850
1851                        /**
1852                         * This call unlike the parent returns a required result. {@inheritDoc}
1853                         */
1854                        @Override
1855                        RequiredResult<T> get(LogProperties props, String key);
1856
1857                        /**
1858                         * Gets a result from properties by trying a list of keys.
1859                         * @param props properties.
1860                         * @param keys list of property keys usually dotted.
1861                         * @return result.
1862                         */
1863                        @Override
1864                        default RequiredResult<T> get(LogProperties props, List<String> keys) {
1865                                if (keys.isEmpty()) {
1866                                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Keys is empty");
1867                                }
1868                                String key = keys.getFirst();
1869                                return get(props, key);
1870                        }
1871
1872                        /**
1873                         * Sets up to converts a value.
1874                         * @param <U> value type
1875                         * @param mapper function.
1876                         * @return new property getter.
1877                         */
1878                        @Override
1879                        default <U> RequiredPropertyGetter<U> map(
1880                                        PropertyFunction<? super T, ? extends U, ? super Exception> mapper) {
1881                                return new RequiredFuncGetter<T, U>(this, mapper, null);
1882                        }
1883
1884                        /**
1885                         * Creates a Property from the given key and this getter.
1886                         * @param key key.
1887                         * @return property.
1888                         * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the key is malformed.
1889                         */
1890                        @Override
1891                        default RequiredProperty<T> build(String key) throws IllegalArgumentException {
1892                                validateKey(key);
1893                                return new DefaultRequiredProperty<>(this, List.of(key));
1894                        }
1895
1896                        /**
1897                         * Creates a Property from the given key and its {@value LogProperties#NAME}
1898                         * parameter.
1899                         * @param key key.
1900                         * @param name interpolates <code>{name}</code> in property name with this
1901                         * value.
1902                         * @return property.
1903                         */
1904                        @Override
1905                        default RequiredProperty<T> buildWithName(String key, String name) {
1906                                var parameters = Map.of(NAME, name);
1907                                validateKeyParameters(key, parameters.keySet());
1908                                String fqn = LogProperties.interpolateKey(key, parameters);
1909                                return build(fqn);
1910                        }
1911
1912                }
1913
1914        }
1915
1916}
1917
1918abstract class AbstractLogPropertiesBuilder<T> {
1919
1920        protected abstract T self();
1921
1922}
1923
1924record DefaultProperty<T>(PropertyGetter<T> propertyGetter, List<String> keys) implements LogProperties.Property<T> {
1925
1926        public DefaultProperty {
1927                Objects.requireNonNull(propertyGetter);
1928                if (keys.isEmpty()) {
1929                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("should have at least one key");
1930                }
1931        }
1932
1933        /**
1934         * Gets the first key.
1935         * @return key.
1936         */
1937        @Override
1938        public String key() {
1939                return keys.get(0);
1940        }
1941
1942        @Override
1943        public Result<T> get(LogProperties properties) {
1944                return propertyGetter.get(properties, keys);
1945        }
1946
1947        @Override
1948        public <U> LogProperties.Property<U> map(PropertyFunction<? super T, ? extends U, ? super Exception> mapper) {
1949                return new DefaultProperty<>(propertyGetter.map(mapper), keys);
1950        }
1951
1952        @Override
1953        public String propertyString(T value) {
1954                return propertyGetter.propertyString(value);
1955        }
1956
1957        @Override
1958        public void set(T value, BiConsumer<String, T> consumer) {
1959                if (value != null) {
1960                        consumer.accept(key(), value);
1961                }
1962        }
1963
1964}
1965
1966record DefaultRequiredProperty<T>(RequiredPropertyGetter<T> propertyGetter,
1967                List<String> keys) implements LogProperties.RequiredProperty<T> {
1968
1969        public DefaultRequiredProperty {
1970                Objects.requireNonNull(propertyGetter);
1971                if (keys.isEmpty()) {
1972                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("should have at least one key");
1973                }
1974        }
1975
1976        /**
1977         * Gets the first key.
1978         * @return key.
1979         */
1980        @Override
1981        public String key() {
1982                return keys.get(0);
1983        }
1984
1985        @Override
1986        public RequiredResult<T> get(LogProperties properties) {
1987                return propertyGetter.get(properties, keys);
1988        }
1989
1990        @Override
1991        public <U> LogProperties.RequiredProperty<U> map(
1992                        PropertyFunction<? super T, ? extends U, ? super Exception> mapper) {
1993                return new DefaultRequiredProperty<>(propertyGetter.map(mapper), keys);
1994        }
1995
1996        @Override
1997        public String propertyString(T value) {
1998                return propertyGetter.propertyString(value);
1999        }
2000
2001        @Override
2002        public void set(T value, BiConsumer<String, T> consumer) {
2003                if (value != null) {
2004                        consumer.accept(key(), value);
2005                }
2006        }
2007
2008}
2009
2010record MapProperties(String description, Map<String, String> map) implements LogProperties {
2011
2012        @Override
2013        public @Nullable String valueOrNull(String key) {
2014                return map.get(key);
2015        }
2016
2017        @Override
2018        public String description(String key) {
2019                return description + " (" + key + ")";
2020        }
2021
2022}
2023
2024record FallbackGetter<T>(PropertyGetter<T> parent,
2025                Supplier<? extends T> fallback) implements RequiredPropertyGetter<T> {
2026
2027        @SuppressWarnings("null") // TODO eclipse bug
2028        @Override
2029        public RequiredResult<T> get(LogProperties props, String key) {
2030                var r = parent.get(props, key);
2031                RequiredResult<T> req = switch (r) {
2032                        case Result.Missing<T> m -> {
2033                                var f = fallback.get();
2034                                if (f == null) {
2035                                        yield PropertyGetter.findRoot(parent) //
2036                                                .errorResult(props, key, new LogProperties.PropertyMissingException("fallback returned null"));
2037                                }
2038                                yield new Result.Success<>(f);
2039                        }
2040                        case Result.Success<T> s -> s;
2041                        case Result.Error<T> e -> e;
2042                };
2043                return req;
2044        }
2045
2046        @Override
2047        public String propertyString(T value) {
2048                return parent.propertyString(value);
2049        }
2050
2051}
2052
2053record MapGetter(RootPropertyGetter parent) implements ChildPropertyGetter<Map<String, String>> {
2054
2055        @Override
2056        public Result<Map<String, String>> get(LogProperties props, String key) {
2057                return parent.get(props, key, (p, k) -> p.mapOrNull(k));
2058        }
2059
2060        @Override
2061        public String propertyString(Map<String, String> value) {
2062                return _propertyString(value);
2063        }
2064
2065        static String _propertyString(Map<?, ?> value) {
2066                StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
2067                boolean first = true;
2068                for (var e : value.entrySet()) {
2069                        if (first) {
2070                                first = true;
2071                        }
2072                        else {
2073                                sb.append("&");
2074                        }
2075                        PercentCodec.encode(sb, String.valueOf(e.getKey()), StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
2076                        Object v = e.getValue();
2077                        if (v != null) {
2078                                sb.append("=");
2079                                PercentCodec.encode(sb, String.valueOf(v), StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
2080                        }
2081                }
2082                return sb.toString();
2083        }
2084
2085}
2086
2087record ListGetter(RootPropertyGetter parent) implements ChildPropertyGetter<List<String>> {
2088
2089        @Override
2090        public Result<List<String>> get(LogProperties props, String key) {
2091                return parent.get(props, key, (p, k) -> p.listOrNull(k));
2092        }
2093
2094        @Override
2095        public String propertyString(List<String> list) {
2096                return _propertyString(list);
2097        }
2098
2099        static String _propertyString(List<?> list) {
2100                StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
2101                boolean first = true;
2102                for (var e : list) {
2103                        if (first) {
2104                                first = true;
2105                        }
2106                        else {
2107                                sb.append(",");
2108                        }
2109                        PercentCodec.encode(sb, String.valueOf(e), StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
2110                }
2111                return sb.toString();
2112        }
2113
2114}
2115
2116record FuncGetter<T, R>(PropertyGetter<T> parent, PropertyFunction<? super T, ? extends R, ? super Exception> mapper,
2117                @Nullable PropertyFunction<? super R, ? extends String, ? super Exception> stringFunc)
2118                implements
2119                        ChildPropertyGetter<R> {
2120
2121        @Override
2122        public Result<R> get(LogProperties props, String key) {
2123                var result = parent.get(props, key);
2124                return switch (result) {
2125                        case Result.Success<T> s -> {
2126                                try {
2127                                        R r = mapper._apply(s.value());
2128                                        if (r == null) {
2129                                                yield PropertyGetter.findRoot(parent).missingResult(props, List.of(key));
2130                                        }
2131                                        yield new Result.Success<>(r);
2132                                }
2133                                catch (Exception e) {
2134                                        yield PropertyGetter.findRoot(parent).errorResult(props, key, e);
2135                                }
2136                        }
2137                        case Result.Error<T> e -> e.convert();
2138                        case Result.Missing<T> m -> m.convert();
2139                };
2140        }
2141
2142        @Override
2143        public String propertyString(R value) {
2144                var f = stringFunc;
2145                if (f != null) {
2146                        return f.apply(value);
2147                }
2148                return ChildPropertyGetter.super.propertyString(value);
2149        }
2150
2151}
2152
2153record RequiredFuncGetter<T, R>(RequiredPropertyGetter<T> parent,
2154                PropertyFunction<? super T, ? extends R, ? super Exception> mapper,
2155                @Nullable PropertyFunction<? super R, ? extends String, ? super Exception> stringFunc)
2156                implements
2157                        RequiredPropertyGetter<R> {
2158
2159        @Override
2160        public RequiredResult<R> get(LogProperties props, String key) {
2161                var result = parent.get(props, key);
2162                return switch (result) {
2163                        case Result.Success<T> s -> {
2164                                try {
2165                                        R r = mapper._apply(s.value());
2166                                        if (r == null) {
2167                                                throw new NullPointerException(
2168                                                                "The property function returned a null. props=" + props + ", key=" + key);
2169                                        }
2170                                        yield new Result.Success<>(r);
2171                                }
2172                                catch (Exception e) {
2173                                        yield PropertyGetter.findRoot(parent).errorResult(props, key, e);
2174                                }
2175                        }
2176                        case Result.Error<T> e -> e.convert();
2177                };
2178        }
2179
2180        @Override
2181        public String propertyString(R value) {
2182                var f = stringFunc;
2183                if (f != null) {
2184                        return f.apply(value);
2185                }
2186                return RequiredPropertyGetter.super.propertyString(value);
2187        }
2188
2189}
2190
2191interface ListLogProperties extends LogProperties {
2192
2193        @Override
2194        default @Nullable String valueOrNull(String key) {
2195                for (var props : properties()) {
2196                        var value = props.valueOrNull(key);
2197                        if (value != null) {
2198                                return value;
2199                        }
2200                }
2201                return null;
2202        }
2203
2204        @Override
2205        default String description(String key) {
2206                StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
2207                boolean first = true;
2208                for (var p : properties()) {
2209                        if (first) {
2210                                first = false;
2211                        }
2212                        else {
2213                                sb.append(", ");
2214                        }
2215                        sb.append(p.description(key));
2216                }
2217                return sb.toString();
2218        }
2219
2220        LogProperties[] properties();
2221
2222        default StringBuilder toString(StringBuilder sb) {
2223                sb.append(getClass().getSimpleName());
2224                sb.append("[properties=").append(Arrays.deepToString(properties())).append("]");
2225                return sb;
2226        }
2227
2228}
2229
2230record CompositeMutableLogProperties(LogProperties[] properties) implements ListLogProperties, MutableLogProperties {
2231
2232        @Override
2233        public MutableLogProperties put(String key, @Nullable String value) {
2234                for (var p : properties()) {
2235                        if (p instanceof MutableLogProperties mp && mp != this) {
2236                                mp.put(key, value);
2237                        }
2238                }
2239                return this;
2240        }
2241
2242        @Override
2243        public String toString() {
2244                return toString(new StringBuilder()).toString();
2245        }
2246
2247}
2248
2249record CompositeLogProperties(LogProperties[] properties) implements ListLogProperties {
2250        @Override
2251        public String toString() {
2252                return toString(new StringBuilder()).toString();
2253        }
